str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An evil-spirit, demon. From daio; a d?Mon or supernatural spirit.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce. From ek and ballo; to eject.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A flock, herd. From ago; a drove.
A swine, hog, sow. Of uncertain derivation; a hog.
